name: NN-DRAW: handwritten digit categorizer
description: During late 2021, just before I've got my first developer job (it was about AI applied to web security), I was getting into machine learning and made my own neural network from scratch. This is the GUI of the product of my NN model applied to the learning of MNIST databese entries (a collection of handwritten digits).
instructions: Draw a digit, clear the canvas using the small <kbd>clear</kbd> button on the top-right
